name: The Network Protector
description:
You play as an anti-virus software agent with the goal of fending off a malicious virus. The only catch? You can't control your rotation or shooting and can only move horizontally or vertically depending on your direction.

This is my first ever game jam entry and I completed it solo. I ran out of time so there is no audio. Thanks for playing any pointers or feedback are always appreciated.

WASD to move, Esc key to pause the game.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheAarimous

Git Repo: https://github.com/Aarimous/GMTK2020
